ygData.subject: RE: Crafted items (some idiot)
ygData.msgSnippet: A bard friend of mine says he made 100 plat selling them to the merchant. They must sell to them at around 200 plat (not sure what his buy price was for the
ygData.messageBody:
A bard friend of mine says he made 100 plat selling
them to the merchant. They must sell to them at around
200 plat (not sure what his buy price was for the
gem(s).

Belgarth


--- Trevalien <trevalien@...> wrote:
> From: "Trevalien" <trevalien@...>
>
> Just out of curiosity, can someone see what a pair
> of crafted gauntlets
> sells for to a merchant? (just be careful u dont
> actualy sell them!) I was
> in Felwithe (on povar) the other day and found that
> someone had sold a pair
> to a merchant (the merchant wanted about 3200pp) I
> know how merchants work
> and I figure that he might have goten 50-100pp.
> There was also some other
> items that i was amazed that anyone would sell but i
> forget what they were
> (i think a BIBS was in there)
>
> Trevalien
